sn36.2:1: "Tisso imā, bhikkhave, vedanā. Katamā tisso? Sukhā vedanā, dukkhā vedanā, adukkhamasukhā vedanā – imā kho, bhikkhave, tisso vedanāti.
sn36.2:2: Sukhaṁ vā yadi vā dukkhaṁ,adukkhamasukhaṁ saha;Ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca,yaṁ kiñci atthi veditaṁ.
sn36.2:3: Etaṁ dukkhanti ñatvāna,mosadhammaṁ palokinaṁ;Phussa phussa vayaṁ passaṁ,evaṁ tattha virajjatī"ti.
